description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记、商务部部长、辽宁省省长、大连市市长。2013年因受贿、贪污、滥用职权罪被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, Party Secretary of Chongqing, Minister of Commerce, Governor of Liaoning, and Mayor of Dalian. In 2013, he was sentenced to life imprisonment for bribery, corruption, and abuse of power.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中共八大元老之一，曾任国务院副总理。薄熙来之父。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China, one of the Eight Elders of the CCP, and former Vice Premier of the State Council. Father of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波的第二任妻子，薄熙来之母。
description.en: The second wife of Bo Yibo and the mother of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来的前妻，李雪峰之女。
description.en: The ex-wife of Bo Xilai, daughter of Li Xuefeng.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来的第二任妻子，因犯故意杀人罪被判处死刑，缓期二年执行。
description.en: The second wife of Bo Xilai, sentenced to a suspended death sentence for intentional homicide.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与李丹宇之子，商人。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Li Danyu, a businessman.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与薄谷开来之子，投资人、律师。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Bo Gu Kailai, an investor and lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长。其进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件是薄熙来事件的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu triggered the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切，后被薄谷开来毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman with close ties to the Bo Xilai family, who was later poisoned by Bo Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。据报道，他反对薄熙来晋升，并在薄熙来事件中公开要求重庆反思。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council. He reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion and publicly called for Chongqing to reflect on the incident during Bo's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理。据报道，她与薄熙来交恶，并阻止其接任副总理职位。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Premier of the State Council. She reportedly had a poor relationship with Bo Xilai and blocked his succession to the Vice Premier position.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，曾任中共中央总书记。薄熙来曾对其进行窃听，在薄熙来事件中，胡锦涛是处理该事件的主要决策者之一。
description.en: A former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. Bo Xilai conducted surveillance on him. During the Bo Xilai incident, Hu was one of the key decision-makers in handling the case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共辽宁省委书记。据报道，他对薄熙来在辽宁的施政不满。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Party Secretary of Liaoning Province. He was reportedly dissatisfied with Bo Xilai's governance in Liaoning.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国商务部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial state administrative organ of Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国大连市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Dalian City, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2012年2月，时任重庆市副市长的王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留，引发的一系列政治事件，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台。
description.en: In February 2012, then Vice Mayor of Chongqing Wang Lijun entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, triggering a series of political events that directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人尼尔·海伍德于2011年11月在重庆被毒杀的案件。该案的调查揭示了薄熙来妻子薄谷开来的罪行，成为薄熙来事件的关键部分。
description.en: The case of British businessman Neil Heywood, who was poisoned to death in Chongqing in November 2011. The investigation revealed the crimes of Bo Xilai's wife, Bo Gu Kailai, becoming a key part of the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动。薄熙来在此期间曾被关押和参加劳动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China. Bo Xilai was imprisoned and subjected to labor during this period.

nodes.id: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

zh-cn: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来主政重庆期间发起的一场打击有组织犯罪和腐败的运动。该运动在提升治安的同时，也因其法律程序问题而备受争议。
description.en: A campaign against organized crime and corruption initiated by Bo Xilai during his tenure in Chongqing. While it improved public security, the campaign was controversial due to its legal process issues.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来在重庆推行的一系列政治、经济和社会政策的总称，特点是强调国家干预、社会公平和宣扬红色文化。
description.en: A term for the series of political, economic, and social policies implemented by Bo Xilai in Chongqing, characterized by an emphasis on state intervention, social equity, and the promotion of 'red culture'.

description.zh-cn: 北京市在1928年至1949年间的名称，为薄熙来的出生地。
description.en: The name of Beijing between 1928 and 1949, and the birthplace of Bo Xilai.

nodes.id: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 负责一审审判薄熙来案的法院。
description.en: The court that conducted the first-instance trial of the Bo Xilai case.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关，负责对薄熙来立案调查。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China, which initiated the investigation into Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局副局长，在薄熙来发起的“打黑”运动中被查处并判处死刑。
description.en: Former Deputy Director of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, who was investigated and sentenced to death during the 'strike black' campaign initiated by Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于辽宁的保健品公司，曾在薄熙来担任商务部长期间获得直销牌照，后因欺诈问题引发蚁力神事件。
description.en: A health products company in Liaoning that obtained a direct selling license while Bo Xilai was Minister of Commerce, and was later involved in the Yilishen incident due to fraud.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是薄一波的次子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the second son of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是胡明之子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the son of Hu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与李丹宇于1976年结婚，1984年离婚。
description.en: Bo Xilai and Li Danyu were married in 1976 and divorced in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与薄谷开来于1987年结婚。
description.en: Bo Xilai and Bo Gu Kailai married in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 李望知是薄熙来与前妻李丹宇所生的长子。
description.en: Li Wangzhi is the eldest son of Bo Xilai and his ex-wife Li Danyu.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来与妻子薄谷开来所生的幼子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the youngest son of Bo Xilai and his wife Bo Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆，引爆了政治丑闻，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台。
description.en: Wang Lijun's entry into the U.S. Consulate in Chengdu ignited a political scandal that directly led to Bo Xilai's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 对海伍德死亡案的复查揭示了薄熙来家庭的犯罪行为，成为其被立案调查的关键原因之一。
description.en: The re-investigation of the Neil Heywood death case exposed the criminal activities of Bo Xilai's family, becoming a key reason for the official investigation against him.

description.zh-cn: 因经济利益矛盾，薄谷开来将尼尔·海伍德毒杀。
description.en: Due to economic disputes, Bo Gu Kailai poisoned Neil Heywood to death.

relationships.target: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来在主政重庆期间发动并领导了“打黑”运动。
description.en: During his tenure in Chongqing, Bo Xilai initiated and led the 'strike black' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 文强是薄熙来“打黑”运动中的重点打击对象，最终被判处死刑。
description.en: Wen Qiang was a key target in Bo Xilai's 'strike black' campaign and was ultimately sentenced to death.

position.en: Chief of Chongqing Public Security Bureau

description.zh-cn: 王立军曾是薄熙来在重庆的得力下属，负责执行“打黑”运动。
description.en: Wang Lijun was Bo Xilai's key subordinate in Chongqing, responsible for implementing the 'strike black' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 王立军与薄熙来决裂后，进入美国领事馆，揭露了薄家的内幕，成为薄熙来的主要政治对手。
description.en: After breaking with Bo Xilai, Wang Lijun entered the U.S. consulate and exposed the Bo family's secrets, becoming Bo's primary political adversary.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，时任总理温家宝反对薄熙来晋升为副总理，并在2012年两会记者会上公开批评重庆市委，对薄熙来的倒台起到了关键作用。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion to Vice Premier and played a key role in his downfall by publicly criticizing the Chongqing Municipal Committee at a 2012 press conference.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，时任副总理吴仪与薄熙来交恶，并在2007年以“裸退”为条件阻止薄熙来接任其副总理职位。
description.en: Then-Vice Premier Wu Yi reportedly had a poor relationship with Bo Xilai and, in 2007, used her 'bare retirement' as leverage to prevent him from succeeding her as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，薄熙来在重庆发起窃听行动，其监控对象包括时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛。
description.en: Bo Xilai reportedly initiated an eavesdropping operation in Chongqing, with targets including then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Jintao.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 一审判处薄熙来无期徒刑，剥夺政治权利终身，并处没收个人全部财产。
description.en: In the first-instance trial, the court sentenced Bo Xilai to life imprisonment, deprived him of political rights for life, and confiscated all his personal property.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 对薄熙来严重违纪问题立案调查。
description.en: Filed a case to investigate Bo Xilai for serious violations of discipline.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来在主政重庆期间，推行了以“唱红打黑”和注重民生为特点的“重庆模式”。
description.en: During his tenure in Chongqing, Bo Xilai promoted the 'Chongqing Model', characterized by 'singing red songs and striking black' and a focus on people's livelihood.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来担任中华人民共和国商务部部长。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as the Minister of Commerce of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共辽宁省委书记闻世震据报曾批评薄熙来“开发的中国城市像欧洲，农村像非洲”，并在2004年薄离开辽宁后举行宴会庆祝。
description.en: Then-Party Secretary of Liaoning, Wen Shizhen, reportedly criticized Bo Xilai, saying 'the developed Chinese cities resemble Europe, while the countryside resembles Africa,' and held a banquet to celebrate Bo's departure from Liaoning in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来担任商务部长期间，中国商务部颁给蚁力神公司直销执照。
description.en: While Bo Xilai was Minister of Commerce, the Ministry of Commerce granted a direct selling license to the Yilishen company.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，薄熙来被关押在北京市立水桥北苑少管所，并参加劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Xilai was detained at the Lishuiqiao Beiyuan Juvenile Detention Center in Beijing and participated in labor.
